ygData.subject: Re: Jig of Vigor
ygData.msgSnippet: If it is true that this song increases mana regeneration, this will make the usefulness of a bard to a group even greater than they currently are.   When you
ygData.messageBody:
If it is true that this song increases mana regeneration, this will make the
usefulness of a bard to a group even greater than they currently are. When
you try this out on a group, tell the spellcasters to go to their Persona
screen so they can monitor how much mana they regenerate per pulse both with
and without the Jig playing. It should be fairly easy to test the
hypothesis.

Galtin
E'ci
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rebecca Small [SMTP:macha_nabaob@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:49 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Jig of Vigor
>
> From: "Rebecca Small" <macha_nabaob@...>
>
> I have seen several mentions of this song being 'useless', etc. Actually
> several of my spellcasting friends tell me that it will cause their man to
>
> regen a bit faster. Now it does not perform like the high level song of
> course, but many of my friends swear by it. We noticed this in beta and it
>
> was widely debated, but many have told me they see a difference. Next time
>
> you are in a group, try it while the casters are medding and see if they
> can
> tell a difference.
> Brilinnia, a Bard on Xegony
>
>
